Detailed Description

ImagePanel class draws a panel containing an image.

This class draws an image into a Panel which can inturn be used anywhere on a GUI

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ImagePanel.ImagePanel (  String  path  )  throws IOException
 

ImagePanel class constructor.

The ImagePanel constructor takes the path for the image as an argument and reads the image into an Image object.

Parameters:
path as an String. Specifies the path for the image file.
